tool.name: Scater: PCA plot
tool.description: Plot cell-level reduced dimension of a normalised SCE
tool.command: Rscript '$__tool_directory__/scater-plot-pca.R' -i '$input_sce' #if str($colour_by).strip(): --colour-by '$colour_by' #end if #if str($size_by).strip(): --size-by '$size_by' #end if #if str($shape_by).strip(): --shape-by '$shape_by' #end if -o '$output_plot'

param.name: colour_by
param.label: Feature (from annotation file) to colour PCA plot points by
param.help: The values represented in this options should be categorical

param.name: size_by
param.label: Feature (from annotation file) to size PCA plot points by
param.help: The values represented in this options should be numerical and not categorical

param.name: shape_by
param.label: Feature (from annotation file) to shape PCA plot points by
param.help: The values represented in this options should be categorical

tool.help: Creates a PCA plot of a normalised SingleCellExperiment object using Scater.
